title: IoT Training
description: Mindmajix IoT Training as an online training platform delivers you the best in the industry IoT knowledge by certified and experienced trainers to master IoT. Interactive sessions include two real-time projects to provide in-depth understanding of advanced IoT concepts that covers IoT methods and technologies, application deployment, network and communication protocols and integrations, security measures and real-time data management on the internet. Course completion certificate from a reputed training platform like Mindmajix is awarded to all the trainees after successful completion of the trainees to showcase the skills they gained through the course.
prerequisites: What are the Prerequisites to take this IoT Course?Basics of networking is suggested for an aspirant to get started with IoT and master it as the subject involves a wide range of IoT enabled devices. Coding is a considerable prerequisite as the application needs embedded programming to be done. Once you get started with the basics, advanced concepts are easy to implement.
instructor_bio: Peter Fernandes has got 5+ of years of industrial experience working for global MNCs. He chose to deliver online training and contribute informative articles and blogs to various websites to share his technical expertise.
review|1|review: I have taken IoT online training from Mindmajix, although it`s online but the team helped me a lot. server access, materials, update about the classes everything is done perfectly by them. I have done my certification also after taking the training here.
review|2|review: Thanks for arranging the IoT session as per my request and then resolving my query in record time to my full satisfaction.  This deserves a 10 out of 10 marks. Keep it up.
review|3|review: I have taken IoT Course. Materials and online training videos are great. You can upgrade your skills without attending face to face session.
content: ['What Is The Internet Of Things (IoT)?', 'Overview Of IoT Connectivity Methods And Technologies', 'Evaluation Of IoT', 'Practice Test & Interview Questions']
short_description: Enroll now for IoT Training and Get Expertise in Internet of Things
